Sentence.sentence: The protection and improvement of the human environment is a major issue which affects the well-being of peoples and economic development throughout the world, read the final declaration from this gathering, the first of a sequence which would lead to the Rio de Janeiro Earth Summit in 1992 and the World Development Summit in Johannesburg three years ago.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都表示"发展，进化"之意。
means: development ： 强调通过一系列自然过程或人工方法使某物潜在或隐藏的可能性显露出来，得以实现。
evolution ： 侧重指事物由简到繁，由低级到高级的连续发展，强调变化或演变。

stems_affixes.word_buile: develop[v.发展, 发达, 发扬]+able能……的→adj.可发展的;可开发的
envelop[n.&v.包封, 遮盖, 包围 n.信封]+e→n.信封；封套
develop[v.发展, 发达, 发扬]+er人→n.开发者
develop[v.发展, 发达, 发扬]+ment表名词→n.发展
en使……+velop包,包裹→包封, 遮盖

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包封, 遮盖, 包围
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+velop包,包裹→包封, 遮盖

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发展, 发达, 发扬
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+velop包,包裹→把包着的打开→发展, 发达

expand_knowledge_list.cn:
the latest developments in
...的最新进展

entry.def: Development is the gradual growth or formation of something.
entry.tran: 发展;成长;发育;生长;形成

example.ex: ...an ideal system for studying the development of the embryo...
example.tran: 研究胎儿发育过程的理想方法
首先他回顾了伊斯兰教的发展过程。

entry.def: Development is the growth of something such as a business or an industry.
entry.tran: (企业、行业等的)发展，扩展，壮大

example.ex: Education is central to a country's economic development...
example.tran: 教育对一个国家的经济发展至关重要。

example.ex: What are your plans for the development of your company?
example.tran: 你打算怎样来发展壮大自己的公司？

entry.def: Development is the process or result of making a basic design gradually better and more advanced.

example.ex: We are spending $850m on research and development.
example.tran: 我们在研发上的投入是 8.5 亿美元。

example.ex: ...the development of new and innovative telephone services.

entry.def: Development is the process of making an area of land or water more useful or profitable.
entry.tran: (地区的)发展;(土地、水域的)开发

example.ex: The talks will focus on economic development of the region.
example.tran: 会谈将着重讨论该地区的经济发展。

example.ex: ...the fostering of development in the rural areas...
example.tran: 对农村地区发展的促进

entry.def: A development is an event or incident which has recently happened and is likely to have an effect on the present situation.

example.ex: Police said there had been a significant development in the case.
example.tran: 警方说此案已经有了重大进展。

entry.def: A development is an area of houses or buildings which have been built by property developers.
entry.tran: 新建住宅区;新开发的楼盘

means.word_mean: 1. act of improving by expanding or enlarging or refining;

sentences.sentence: "he congratulated them on their development of a plan to meet the emergency"

means.word_mean: 2. a process in which something passes by degrees to a different stage (especially a more advanced or mature stage);

sentences.sentence: "the development of his ideas took many years"
"the slow development of her skill as a writer"

means.word_mean: 3. a recent event that has some relevance for the present situation;
4. the act of making some area of land or water more profitable or productive or useful;
5. a district that has been developed to serve some purpose;

sentences.sentence: "such land is practical for small park developments"

means.word_mean: 6. a state in which things are improving; the result of developing (as in the early part of a game of chess);

sentences.sentence: "after he saw the latest development he changed his mind and became a supporter"
"in chess your should take care of your development before moving your queen"

means.word_mean: 7. (biology) the process of an individual organism growing organically; a purely biological unfolding of events involved in an organism changing gradually from a simple to a more complex level;

sentences.sentence: "he proposed an indicator of osseous development in children"

means.word_mean: 8. processing a photosensitive material in order to make an image visible;

sentences.sentence: "the development and printing of his pictures took only two hours"
